page.title: 17The Apple Centre
page.content: The Apple Centre is situated on the A415 Witney road. It is owned by brothers Murray and Douglas Maclean,and has been in the Maclean family since 1935.The land covers thirty four and a half acres,most of which is orchard. There is also a farm shop which sells the products of the land and locally grown vegetables straight to the public. The fruits grown at the Apple Centre are gooseberries, strawberries, raspberries, loganberries, black currants, red currants,plums,rhubarb four varieties of pears and seventeen different varieties of apples.Eight staff are employed to work on the land and in the shop and extra staff are hired for the apple picking season from August to October.
